original_title: 両親が突然不在…残された幼馴染とコンドームを買うお金もなく中出ししまくった日々 久留木玲
overview: In the plot, Hajime and Rei are friends, both living in the same building, both coming from very humble backgrounds, and both with broken families having just single parents, a Mom and a Dad, that eventually get together in an affair.  However one day the parents suddenly disappear and the 2 friends are left alone, not knowing any better they begin to pass the days f*cking.  A few days later, the abusive Father of Hajime eventually returns not realizing that things have already changed a lot.
title: While My Parents Were Suddenly Away... I Was Left with My Childhood Friend, and We Didn't Have Any Money for Condoms, So We Spent Our Days Creampie Fucking Like Crazy
